name: Santa Claus The Human
description:
Made For GBstudio Christmas Jam. (The theme was "Cat Christmas". sorry but it's just a Beta)

Santa Claus the Human was captured by bandit cats! Your mission is to reach and save santa claus (by defeating the bandits)

Controls:

A - talk/attack

B - back

AWSD - movement 

Please consider donating a few bucks if you want to see more update <3
